Replying to @ksylor 2020-04-29 15:06
@ksylor @Netlify Looks like your redirects are all relative to fully qualified domain names. So they won't pick up on other domains like Preview Builds (there's no match). But if you made them root relative, you'd probably be good to go on any domain.
  • Permalink
